title: Ult ab freeze
body: When I tab out the game freezes but audio still plays. Also when ever i try to tab into anything nothing happens. If I am lucky alt f4 will close the game and I can reconnect. If anyone knows what is causing this or how to fix it please let me know.

replies.body: It kinda sounds like League might be sort of crashing whenever you try to switch windows for some reason. I'd try closing some of the background programs or running a clean boot if you *really* have to alt+tab, but it might be good to try to avoid tabbing if you can!
